code: import{request}from'../utils/axios';import{CREATE_CLASSROOM,ADD_CLASSROOM,GET_STUDENT_LIST,ADD_PROBLEM}from'./types';var TEACHER_URL="/api/teacher";export function addClassroom(dataToSubmit){var data=request("POST",TEACHER_URL+"/classroom",dataToSubmit);return{type:ADD_CLASSROOM,payload:data};}export function createClassroom(dataToSubmit){var data=request("POST",TEACHER_URL+"/class",dataToSubmit);return{type:CREATE_CLASSROOM,payload:data};}export function getStudentlist(class_id){var data=request("GET","/api/class?class_id="+class_id);return{type:GET_STUDENT_LIST,payload:data};}export function addProblem(dataToSubmit){var data=request("POST","/api/problem/addProblem",dataToSubmit);return{type:ADD_PROBLEM,payload:data};}
